NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
IDAEA: I do not understand.. Why have we warped to Statue Island? I was certain the Nomai here would have deactivated this warp receiver in preparation of hosting visitors to see the test today..
2
1
PYE: Idaea, a cyclone approaches! Let us return to the warp tower back on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> to wait for Poke; perhaps she will know how to show us to the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station!</color>
